basic.Target Organism: [Ref.19330556] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D31 (MBC=2.0 μg/ml), Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium C610 (MBC=2.5 μg/mL), Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61 (MBC=7.0μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799 (MBC=10.0 μg/ml), Aeromonas salmonicida sub sp. salmonicida A449 (MBC=2.0 μg/ml), Listonella anguillarum 02-11 (MBC=1.0 μg/ml), Yersinia ruckeri 96-4 (MBC=2.0 μg/ml);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus epidermis C621(MBC=8.5 μg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans C627 (MBC=10.0 μg/ml).
